reviews.name: Emily S.
reviews.text: I finally understood pocket depth - that was the missing piece for me. Before this course I was guessing every time, and my cuticle line was inconsistent. Now I know exactly how deep to go on every client.

reviews.name: Chloe R.
reviews.text: No more redness or overworked skin. I used to get complaints about sensitivity after the manicure - that's completely gone now. The pressure and angle adjustments made all the difference.

reviews.name: Svetlana L.
reviews.text: Faster workflow, cleaner cuticle line. I cut my manicure time by about 10 minutes per client just by switching to one bit. The system is very logical - once you understand the zones, everything clicks.

reviews.name: Hannah M.
reviews.text: I used to avoid clients with tight, adhered cuticles because I was scared of cutting or damaging the skin. This lesson broke it down step by step - now those are my easiest appointments.

reviews.name: Madison P.
reviews.text: I stopped buying new bits hoping they'd fix my results. Turns out it was my angle and pressure, not the tool. This course fixed both - one flame bit is genuinely all I need now.

reviews.name: Ksenia K.
reviews.text: My lifting problem at the cuticle line is gone. I didn't realize how much my cuticle prep was affecting gel adhesion until I learned the proper technique here. Clients are going 3+ weeks now.

reviews.name: Lily T.
reviews.text: The high RPM safety section alone was worth the price. I was terrified of going above 15k - now I work at 25k comfortably and my clients say the manicure feels smoother than ever.

reviews.name: Natalie W.
reviews.text: I learned how to read each cuticle type before I even start the e-file. That evaluation step changed everything - I'm not guessing anymore, I have a clear plan for every finger.

reviews.name: Olivia B.
reviews.text: My manicures finally look 'fresh' after 2 weeks. Before, clients would come back with grown-out cuticle lines after 7-10 days. The pocket technique keeps everything clean much longer.

reviews.name: Grace D.
reviews.text: Clear, practical, no fluff. I watched it twice and applied it the same day. The before-and-after difference on my very next client was obvious - even she noticed.
